page.title: 14Village Hobbies,West Overton
page.content:
We made a survey of the people in West Overton and Fyfield to find out what they did in their spare time. We asked adults and children. Here is a list of the activities and pastimes they mentioned, beginning with the most popular ones:
playing with friends, golf, fishing, making models, swimming, ornaments, reading books, horse care, home computers, electrical playing team games, appliances, gardening, pottery, travelling, bird watching, horse riding, campaigning knitting, against cruel sewing, sports. macrame,
